sentence: The pool was huge with great food and drinks pretty costly though
I have rented from Charlies I the past and stood in a very long line to rent but at least they had a car for us and charged us the quoted amount
The rental car companies charge a daily fee usually 495
Why did I pay 175 for something that it was going to be complementary
Be prepared to pay 100 for each night you stay on top of what you already paid
Expensive Hotel Poor Service and Facilities not up to par

First of all they charge a hundred dollars deposit for every night that you stay there so if you stay there for five days that 500 deposit they put a hold on your credit card 3 to 5 days after you check out
We were supposed to have 2 rooms which they made us pay for up front but would not give us the key to the second because it was not clean at 8PM
The restaurants and even the convenience store charge a service fee that is not directly passed on to the staff so I felt the need to re tip them
Charging to rent pool floatie toys
The rooms amenities and food were all first rate and the property was well maintained
For what we paid we could have gone to the finest all inclusive available
The staff is amazing and pay attention to detail
Otherwise the staff was first rate and the setting gorgeous
We were pleased to get a great rate as the property is still in transition and parts are under construction
There are plenty of water sports options and fairly priced
And for the price the range of pleasures kindness and warmth is unbeatable
Great weather in a beautiful setting with a staff that operates with a great attitude at a price point that I would put up against ANY resort in the Caribbean
Top of the line service specially from our waiter Jan He went the extra mile paying attention to every single detail to please us from the adults to the children
Very friendly staff but you are charged a steep price for anything
